name: Caster's Curse
description:
Everything in this game was made from scratch in 1 week during the Blackthornprod Game Jam #3.

Fitting the Blackthornprod Game Jam Theme: Choose to have less lives to make your magic more powerful, or you can choose to have lesser magic powers for more health.

The curse must be broken. In order to do so, you must complete the trials of the abyss. Will you lose yourself in the pursuit of power or will you overcome with what little magic you have left?

Instructions:

Complete waves of combat and choose between lives and the size of your magical attacks. Giving up life will greatly increase the size of your attacks and give you a better chance of hitting your enemies. High risk, high reward, you decide your path.
